# Hubuddha Villas

> Luxury villa rentals in Ubud, Bali

Hubuddha Villas offers brand-new private villas with pools, rice field views, and modern amenities in the heart of Ubud, Bali. Perfect for couples, families, and digital nomads seeking an authentic Balinese experience with modern comfort.

## Villas

We offer luxury villas featuring:
- Private infinity pools
- Stunning rice field views
- Fully equipped modern kitchens
- High-speed fiber internet (ideal for remote work)
- Air conditioning
- Daily housekeeping
- Outdoor showers
- Dedicated workspace

## Location

Our villas are located in Pejeng Kawan, Ubud, Bali, Indonesia. This peaceful area offers:
- 10 minutes from Ubud center
- Close to Tirta Empul Temple
- Near Tegallalang Rice Terraces
- Easy access to Ubud's restaurants, cafes, and yoga studios
